dmca.title: DTV-Satellite objects to babelfish translation
dmca.body:
D.M.C.A. Complaint


July 14, 2006

Note to Google Legal Support - D.M.C.A. Complaints:

The domain/IP address listed in this complaint form has stolen verbatim 100% of our website that our company has spent thousands of dollars, time and hard work in creating and promoting (both online and offline). Below is a list of 78 URL's on our website and a corresponding list of 78 URL's on "their" website they have stolen.

1. "The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on:
